short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send emails and attachments from Gmail directly to QAction. Requires a QAction account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QAction for Gmail is a powerful extension designed to streamline your email and attachment management. With just a few clicks, you can send emails and attachments directly to QAction without ever leaving Gmail. This extension enhances your productivity by enabling quick and easy file indexing, ensuring that your important documents are organized and accessible when you need them.

KEY FEATURES
-----------------------------------------------------
INTEGRATE SEAMLESSLY
✔️ Send Emails to QAction: Directly send your emails to QAction from within Gmail, simplifying your workflow.
✔️ Attachment Management: Choose to send individual attachments, the entire email, or both to QAction.
✔️ Quick Indexing: Index your files swiftly and get back to your core tasks without any hassle.

GET MORE DONE
✔️ QAction for Gmail eliminates the need to switch between applications, saving you time and effort. By integrating seamlessly with Gmail, this extension allows you to manage your emails and attachments efficiently.

WORK SIMPLY
✔️ Direct Transfer: Send emails and attachments to QAction without leaving your Gmail interface.
✔️ Organized Files: Keep your files organized and indexed in QAction, ensuring you can find what you need when you need it.
✔️ Increased Efficiency: Spend less time managing emails and more time on productive tasks.

HOW IT WORKS
-----------------------------------------------------
1️⃣ Install the Extension: Add QAction for Gmail to your Chrome browser.
2️⃣ Connect to QAction: Log in to your QAction account within the extension.
🎉🎉🎉 You're Done 🎉🎉🎉

You can now...
⭐️ Send Emails and Attachments: Select the email or attachments you want to send to QAction and click the QAction icon.
⭐️ Index and Manage: Once sent, your emails and attachments are indexed in QAction for easy access and management.

SUPPORT
-----------------------------------------------------
For any issues or questions, our dedicated support team is here to help. Contact us at support@qflow.com for assistance.
